markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Skeleton Guard](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3193)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The most common skeletal minions are mere guardians.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Skeleton Guard](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3193)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=652" />
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=772" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=722" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 312 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +2; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +3

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (20 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +2 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +2 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 4
([void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83))

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95)

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) 5, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=586) 5, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) 5, piercing 5, slashing 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
scimitar +6 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortbow +6 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-472" />
name: Skeleton Guard
